(Simplified: 摈)
Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 賓 indicates the sound; 扌 (hand) conveys the meaning.
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 扌 [ shǒu ] hand
    • 賓 [ bīn ] guest, visitor; surname; submit
①排除，拋棄：擯棄。擯除。擯黜(罷黜並放逐)。擯諸門外。
②古同“儐”，迎賓。
擯棄 [ bìn qì ]: to abandon; to discard; to cast away
擯斥 [ bìn chì ]: to reject; to dismiss
擯除 [ bìn chú ]: to discard; to get rid of; to dispense with
擯棄不用 [ bìn qì bù yòng ]: to dismiss sb. or sth. (idiom)
擯黜 [ bìn chù ]: to banish; to exile

擯字的基本解释

擯
bìn
见“摈”。

擯字的汉语字典释义

[①]［bìn］
［《廣韻》必刃切，去震，幫。］
“摈1”的繁体字。“賓2”的被通假字。
(1)排斥；弃绝。
(2)指傅姆。
(3)通“儐”。接待宾客。

擯字的康熙字典解释

【卯集中】【手字部】　擯； 康熙笔画：18； 页码：页460第27
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?必仞切，賓去聲。斥也，棄也。【崔寔政論】寡不勝衆，遂見擯棄。　又與儐同。導賓也。主國之君所使出接賓者，在主曰擯，在客曰介。【禮·聘義】卿爲上擯，大夫爲承擯，士爲紹擯。【疏】承者，承副上擯也。紹者，繼續承擯也。【周禮·秋官·小行人】凡四方之使者，大客則擯。【註】擯而見之王，使得親言也。　又【正韻】?民切，音賓。義同。通作賓。俗作?。

Stubbornly
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［bìn］
["Guang Yun" must be cut, go to shake, help. ]
"摈1" in traditional characters. "Bin 2" was passed falsely.
(1) Rejection; rejection.
(2) Refers to Fu Mu.
(3) Through "brother". Reception of guests.
Stubbornly
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Collection] [Hand Character Department] 　摈; Kangxi Strokes: 18; Page Number: Page 460 27
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun]? It must be cut, and the guest will go. Reprimand, abandon. [Cui Yu political theory] Outnumbered, so I saw the rejection.　 Same with the bridesmaid again. Lead the guest also. Those who are used by the ruler of the host country to pick up the guests are called "in the lord", and in the guest "introduction". 【Rite·Employment】Qing is the upper guard, the doctor is the Chengde, and the scholar is Shaojun. 【Sparse】The successor, the deputy of the successor. Shaozhe, continue to bear the same. 【Zhou Li·Qiuguan·Xiao Xingren】Anyone who is a messenger in the four directions, but a big guest will be rejected. [Note] The King of Confession makes him speak for himself.　[Zheng Yun]? Minqie, Yinbin. The same meaning. Pass as a guest. Popular work?.
